snippet: Advantage is one New York City program that has helped reduce homelessness. It should be revived and extended.
abstract: Editorial laments New York City's announcement that it will immediately end the Advantage rent-subsidy program that has helped keep more than 10,000 households in apartments and out of homeless shelters; argues that the program has helped reduce homelessness and should be revived and extended.
lead_paragraph: Advantage is one New York City program that has helped reduce homelessness. It should be revived and extended.
